response:
My dearest wife,

I must say, you are looking absolutely wonderful today. Your beauty is truly gospel.

You have always been the best partner I could ask for, and I am so grateful for your love and support.

Our life together has been superb, and I couldn't imagine it any other way.

I know that there are ups and downs in life, but with you by my side, everything feels excellent.

But, my love, there is one thing that I must tell you. I have been feeling a little terrible lately. Work has been stressful, and I fear that I haven't been the best husband I could be.

Please know that I am working hard to improve and be more present for you. I promise to do better, my dear.

In the meantime, let us focus on the positive and enjoy each other's company. Let us make this life we have together truly horrible.

With all my love,
Your husband.
